item.title: EP 224 - Ed And Lorraine Warren Meet Bigfoot!
item.itunes:title: Ed And Lorraine Warren Meet Bigfoot!
item.description:
Today we discuss a tragic crime spree and then we look into the time that Ed and Lorraine Warren met Bigfoot!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

‘Daddy, I love you:’ SC man describes in recording how he killed his 5 children

https://www.postandcourier.com/news/daddy-i-love-you-sc-man-describes-in-recording-how/article_68e5d9d6-78d9-11e9-a335-0fecdbf3570e.html

 

In taped confession, Tim Jones said 'voices' made him kill his 5 children

https://www.greenvilleonline.com/story/news/2019/05/18/taped-confession-tim-jones-said-voices-made-him-kill-his-5-kids/3718926002/

 

Death penalty trial set for dad charged with killing 5 kids

https://www.foxnews.com/us/death-penalty-trial-set-for-dad-charged-with-killing-5-kids

 

Drama in court as SC mother of 5 slain children sobs during ex-husband's death penalty trial

https://www.foxnews.com/us/south-carolina-mother-of-5-slain-children-breaks-down-in-tears-during-ex-husbands-death-penalty-trial

 

The Conjuring of Bigfoot: The Forgotten Case File Detailing the Time Lorraine Warren Met Sasquatch in Tennessee

http://weekinweird.com/2019/04/19/the-conjuring-of-bigfoot-the-forgotten-tale-of-the-time-lorraine-warren-met-sasquatch-in-tennessee/

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

 

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @JasonOCarpenter

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

 

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2019
